title: Journeyman Project 1 pre-turbo
description:
I was cleaning out a closet the other day, and found my copy of the original Journeyman Project.  This is the pre-turbo version of Journeyman 1.  Just for fun, I played it, and found that it did not run on my Windows 7 pro OS, but did run under the XP emulator that comes with W7pro.  

There were a few slight display problems (could not clearly read the left information panel), but 
it worked well enough to enjoy and ultimately succeed.  

I suspect that it would run on any version of Windows XP or earlier, and I would not be surprised 
if it ran under DOS as well.

Simply copy all files to a convenient directory, and run JMSETUP.EXE.
  
Save often, look everywhere, and pick up everything you can.  Also, read the manual carefully - 
you will need some of the information along the way, not to mention the three codes that have to be typed in.

Enjoy!
